caption.title: Femur development between CS18 and CS23 (before ossification).
caption.p: Representative longitudinal section images and 3-D reconstructed images. Longitudinal section images were acquired using PCX-CT between CS18 and CS21 and 7-T MR imaging between CS22 and CS23. fh: femoral head; gt: greater trochanter; If: intercondylar fossa; lt: lesser trochanter; yellow arrow: phase 4 according to Streeterâ€™s classification. See also S1, S2, S3, S4, S5 and S6 Movies.
